txt.en: 'I'm not sure if I should purchase a new helm or bear the expense of a heftier axe....'
'A new helm would be a help should one of those goblins take me unawares....'
'A good two-handed axe would cleave even the fattest of goblins in twain....'
'I've been assigned to Rath Teraig, and I need to acquire better equipment.'
